message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this round, but I'm open to a more even split later if you agree to my offer.
Let's be more equitable. I'll take a bit less this time, and we can work toward a more even split in the future.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than that. Let's split the difference from your last offer.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to go up a bit from my last offer, and hope we can find a fair split.
